Package com.nevergarden.myna.core

Class Myna

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • android.opengl.GLSurfaceView
          • com.nevergarden.myna.core.Myna
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback2
    public class Myna
extends android.opengl.GLSurfaceView
    Core engine view, which should be extended to be used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Myna

        public Myna​(android.content.Context context,
            android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
        Myna base `View` class, should be extended to be able to make it work on updates. This class handles inputs, updates and loops.
        Parameters:
        context - Application Context
        attrs - Attributes

    • Method Detail

      • performClick

        public boolean performClick()
        A method to override click.
        Overrides:
        performClick in class android.view.View
        Returns:
        boolean if clickListener is was called

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent​(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        Handles all motion events for eventDispatcher override if eventDispatcher is not wanted.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class android.view.View
        Parameters:
        event - MotionEvent
        Returns:
        boolean true if event is handled false otherwise.

      • setCurrentStage

        public void setCurrentStage​(Stage newStage,
                            java.lang.Boolean dispose)
        Changes the current stage to another stage. If default stage is not wanted don't call super method of `Myna.init()`.
        Parameters:
        newStage - a newly created stage
        dispose - dispose the previous stage

      • setCurrentStage

        public Stage setCurrentStage​(Stage newStage)
        Changes current stage and returns the previous stage.
        Parameters:
        newStage - a newly created stage
        Returns:
        Stage previous stage

      • loadAssets

        public void loadAssets()
        Override this method to populate assets on load.

      • init

        public void init()
        Override this method to populate stage.

      • update

        public void update​(long deltaTime)
        Override this method for update calls. This method is called before rendering.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time passed since last render

      • onResize

        public void onResize​(int width,
                     int height)
        Override this method if you want custom resizing logic.
        Parameters:
        width - new width
        height - new height

      • render

        public void render()
        Called on each render and draws all stage drawables. Don't override unless you know what you are doing.
